headline.print_headline: Once Web Only, Shopping Sites Hang Real Shingles
headline.main: Once Proudly Web Only, Shopping Sites Hang Out Real Shingles

docs.snippet: After years of criticizing physical stores as relics, even e-commerce zealots are acknowledging there is something to a bricks-and-mortar location....
docs.abstract: Many e-commerce companies are opening bricks-and-mortar locations, acknowledging that customers want to see what they are buying in person; most of these shops will be small, carry less inventory and have fewer staff members in effort to offer semi-traditional shopping experience without all the costs.
docs.lead_paragraph: After years of criticizing physical stores as relics, even e-commerce zealots are acknowledging there is something to a bricks-and-mortar location.

headline.print_headline: Obama Facing Critical Choice After Shooting
headline.seo: President Obama Facing Critical Choice After Newtown Shooting
headline.main: Obama Facing Critical Choice After Shooting

docs.snippet: Hurricane Sandy, last month’s Latino turnout for Democrats and now the Newtown, Conn., shootings have presented President Obama with many decisions — and openings to make new arguments....
docs.abstract: White House Memo; Pres Obama must decide whether to wage battles in his second term on issues that he cares about but may not win without a major shift in the dynamics of Washington; events like Hurricane Sandy, high Latino turnout for Democrats in November election and the mass shooting in Newtown, Conn, give him the opportunity to make fresh arguments for legislation on gun control, climate change and immigration.
docs.lead_paragraph: Hurricane Sandy, last month’s Latino turnout for Democrats and now the Newtown, Conn., shootings have presented President Obama with many decisions — and openings to make new arguments.

headline.print_headline: Russian Fans Marching Backward to Intolerance
headline.seo: Russian Soccer Fans Marching Backward to Intolerance
headline.main: Russian Soccer Fans Marching Backward to Intolerance

docs.snippet: The largest fan club of Zenit St. Petersburg, the two-time defending Russian champion, has demanded that the team include no black or gay players....
docs.abstract: Landscrona, largest fan club of soccer team Zenit St Petersburg, posts letter on its Web site demanding that the team include no black or gay players; episode is another embarrassment for Russia as it prepares to host the 2018 World Cup and for Gazprom, government-controlled natural gas company that owns Zenit St Petersburg and is a sponsor of the Champions League, Europe's most important club tournament.
docs.lead_paragraph: The largest fan club of Zenit St. Petersburg, the two-time defending Russian champion, has demanded that the team include no black or gay players.

headline.print_headline: In Russia, Calls for a Halt To Adoptions by Americans
headline.seo: Russian Officials Call for Ban on Adoptions by U.S. Citizens
headline.main: In Russia, Calls for a Halt to Adoptions by Americans

docs.snippet: After President Obama signed a law last week that bars those accused of rights abuses from traveling to the United States, some Russian lawmakers vowed to retaliate....
docs.abstract: Some Russian lawmakers are calling for ban on adoptions of Russian children by American citizens, in bid to toughen their response to new United States law barring Russians who are accused of violating human rights from traveling to America and from owning real estate or other financial assets in the country.

byline.original: By DAVID M. HERSZENHORN and ANDREW ROTH

docs.lead_paragraph: After President Obama signed a law last week that bars those accused of rights abuses from traveling to the United States, some Russian lawmakers vowed to retaliate.

headline.print_headline: State Department Rebukes Israel Over Settlement Activity
headline.main: State Department Rebukes Israel Over Settlement Activity

docs.snippet: The State Department on Tuesday accused Israel of engaging in a “pattern of provocative action” over plans to proceed with new settlement construction in the West Bank and East Jerusalem....
docs.abstract: State Department accuses Israel of engaging in pattern of provocative action over country’s plans to proceed with new settlement construction in West Bank and East Jerusalem; remarks are rare rebuke of close ally.
docs.lead_paragraph: The State Department on Tuesday accused Israel of engaging in a “pattern of provocative action” over plans to proceed with new settlement construction in the West Bank and East Jerusalem.

headline.print_headline: Ireland: Abortion Would Be Allowed in Some Cases
headline.seo: Irish Government Set to Allow Abortion in Rare Cases
headline.main: Irish Government Set to Allow Abortion in Rare Cases

docs.snippet: The Irish government said Tuesday that it was preparing to allow abortion under limited circumstances in an effort to comply with demands by the European Court of Human Rights....
docs.abstract: Irish government says it is preparing to allow abortion under limited circumstances in effort to comply with demands by European Court of Human Rights to clarify country’s legal position on the issue.
docs.lead_paragraph: The Irish government said Tuesday that it was preparing to allow abortion under limited circumstances in an effort to comply with demands by the European Court of Human Rights.

docs.snippet: The W. K. Kellogg Foundation says an effort must be made across an entire community’s food system....
docs.lead_paragraph: The W. K. Kellogg Foundation says an effort must be made across an entire community’s food system.

docs.snippet: A scholar at Old Dominion says education experts have abandoned the I.Q. test as a measure of intelligence....
docs.lead_paragraph: A scholar at Old Dominion says education experts have abandoned the I.Q. test as a measure of intelligence.
